title: Find factor pairs of the first term
text: The only factors of $$2a^2$$ are a and 2a. Since its only that pair, lets put them in the parentheses.

title: Find factor pairs of the third term
text: The only factors of $$3$$ are $$1$$ and $$3$$.

title: Test
text: Test all possibly combinations of the factors until the correct product is found.
